remarks: An integer increased by another integer is an element of a half-open integer range if and only if the integer is contained in the half-open integer range with bounds decreased by the other integer.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Mar-2018.)
statement: elfzomelpfzo $p |- ( ( ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) /\ ( K e. ZZ /\ L e. ZZ ) ) -> ( K e. ( ( M - L ) ..^ ( N - L ) ) <-> ( K + L ) e. ( M ..^ N ) ) ) $.
